active_tasks.title: Create Video Tutorial for Daily Workflow Automation
steps: Wait for written quick-start guide completion and validation
Review written instructions and setup process
Plan video tutorial structure and key points to cover
Record screen capture of complete setup process:
Edit video with annotations and captions for clarity
Include troubleshooting section for common issues
Add voiceover or text annotations explaining each step
Review video for accuracy and completeness
Prepare final video for distribution
resources: Setup process documentation from pilot users
active_tasks.instructions: Video tutorial will supplement written instructions for Design team and future department rollouts. Wait for written instructions to be tested and validated before creating video to ensure accuracy. Focus on visual demonstration of setup process and common troubleshooting scenarios.
active_tasks.content:
**Steps:**
Wait for written quick-start guide completion and validation
Review written instructions and setup process
Plan video tutorial structure and key points to cover
Record screen capture of complete setup process:
Edit video with annotations and captions for clarity
Include troubleshooting section for common issues
Add voiceover or text annotations explaining each step
Review video for accuracy and completeness
Prepare final video for distribution

**Resources:**
- Screen recording software
- Video editing tools
- Written setup instructions (when available)
- Daily Workflow Automation project documentation
- Setup process documentation from pilot users

**Instructions:**
Video tutorial will supplement written instructions for Design team and future department rollouts. Wait for written instructions to be tested and validated before creating video to ensure accuracy. Focus on visual demonstration of setup process and common troubleshooting scenarios.

active_tasks.content: Implement Immediate Power Outage Solution for Maria**
steps: Confirm Maria is testing cafe work today during power outage
Have Maria document which cafes she visits (location, wifi quality, noise level, power outlets)
Test critical functionality: client calls via Teams mobile first, then laptop when she arrives at cafe
Monitor today's work session - check if client notices any issues
Collect feedback from Maria by end of day on feasibility
If cafe works: Get list of 3-5 reliable cafe options near her
If cafe doesn't work: Research coworking spaces in Dnipropetrovsk left bank
Prepare cost-benefit analysis for management decision tomorrow
Make decision: company pays coworking (4,500 UAH/month) vs. other solutions

active_tasks.title: Schedule Maria's Project Review Urgently
steps: Manager messages Maria immediately: "Need to schedule review with client ASAP"
Maria contacts project manager or client directly
Propose times for tomorrow (specify she has almost everything ready to present)
If tomorrow doesn't work, push for Wednesday maximum
Maria prepares presentation of work completed this week
Include 2-3 style options if possible (gives client choice, increases approval odds)
Conduct review meeting - focus on getting clear style/direction feedback
Document feedback immediately in writing (email/chat) to avoid misunderstandings
Manager follows up post-review: "Did Maria's work align with your expectations?"
